body_html:
this PR is failing python 2.7. Here's the stacktrace:

======================================================================
ERROR: test_serialization_container (__main__.TestTorch)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_torch.py", line 3687, in test_serialization_container
    torch.save(module.Net(), checkpoint)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python2.7.9/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 120, in save
    return _save(obj, f, pickle_module, pickle_protocol)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python2.7.9/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 186, in _save
    pickler.dump(obj)
PicklingError: Can't pickle <type 'instancemethod'>: attribute lookup __builtin__.instancemethod failed

body:
this PR is failing python 2.7. Here's the stacktrace:

```
======================================================================
ERROR: test_serialization_container (__main__.TestTorch)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_torch.py", line 3687, in test_serialization_container
    torch.save(module.Net(), checkpoint)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python2.7.9/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 120, in save
    return _save(obj, f, pickle_module, pickle_protocol)
  File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python2.7.9/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 186, in _save
    pickler.dump(obj)
PicklingError: Can't pickle <type 'instancemethod'>: attribute lookup __builtin__.instancemethod failed

```
